p:
In another small report, Huang et al demonstrated that SARS‐CoV‐2 associated myocardial injury occurred on 5 out of 41 patients, and was manifested as an increase in hs‐cTnI levels (>28 pg/mL). Among these five patients, ICU management was required in four, indicating the severe nature of the myocardial injury in patients with COVID‐19.
20
